description: Calculates the system's Error Rate percentage mathematically. Use this to determine if the system is HEALTHY, WARNING, or CRITICAL.

configuration.query: FROM kibana_sample_data_logs | EVAL is_error = CASE(response >= 500, 1, 0) | STATS total = COUNT(*), errors = SUM(is_error) | EVAL error_rate = ROUND(TO_DOUBLE(errors) / TO_DOUBLE(total) * 100.0, 2) | EVAL status = CASE(error_rate > 5.0, "CRITICAL", error_rate > 1.0, "WARNING", "HEALTHY")
